snp1.8:6.3: mahantā → ye mahantā vā (bj, pts1) | mahanta (?)
snp1.8:7.1: adiṭṭhā → addiṭṭhā (bj, pts1) | adiṭṭha (?), va → ye ca (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
snp1.8:7.3: Bhūtā va sambhavesī va → bhūtā vā sambhavesī vā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
snp1.8:8.2: na kañci → naṃ kañci (bj, pts1) | naṃ kiñci (s1-3) | na kiñci (mr)
